GLUT|ES Documentation

Version 1.0

Introduction

The OpenGL Utility Toolkit (GLUT), originally written by Mark Kilgard, is a window system independent toolkit for writing OpenGL programs.
GLUT|ES is a port of the OpenSource FreeGLUT alternative to GLUT for WinCE and Win32 systems based on OpenGL|ES. Most of GLUT API v.3 functionnalities are present: window creation, callbacks, menus, timers etc. Only functions that cannot exist with OpenGL|ES or are not pertinent have not been ported (like overlays, joysticks on PocketPC, ...).
GLUT|ES is developped by Joachim Pouderoux.

Installation

To use GLUT|ES, just include glutes.h in your source file and link your project with glutes.lib .
